objects.text:
• Exclusive Guerlain luxury fragrance
• Elegant honeycomb design bottle
• Fresh, nature-inspired pear scent

product_details.name: Guerlain Aqua Allegoria Pera Granita: A Luxurious Journey in a Bottle
product_details.description:
• Exclusive Guerlain fragrance from the prestigious Aqua Allegoria collection
• Elegant honeycomb-pattern gold cap design showcasing premium craftsmanship
• Beautiful gradient rose gold to clear glass bottle
• Sophisticated dual-tone design with gold and rose gold accents
• Part of the exclusive Aqua Allegoria line featuring fresh, nature-inspired scents
• Luxurious 75ml/2.5 fl oz spray bottle
• Distinctive pear-inspired fragrance notes (Pera Granita)
• Collector's edition bottle design with iconic Guerlain bee emblem
• Perfect blend of modern aesthetics and classic luxury
• Ideal for fragrance connoisseurs and luxury perfume collectors

banner_details:
The banner presents a luxurious and elegant fragrance promotion. The layout is split vertically into two contrasting halves. The left side features a dark background with subtle honeycomb patterns and faded golden circles, reinforcing a sense of sophistication. The primary headline ("heading") in bold serif typography introduces the product name in an elegant tone, followed by a refined subheading ("subheading"). Below that, product highlights ("description") are displayed in a neat bulleted list. A large, stylized price tag ("price") grabs attention, and below it sits a prominent call-to-action button ("cta" over "cta_background"). The right half showcases a high-quality perfume image ("product_image"), set against a soft pastel background, balancing the visual weight. 

**Color Palette:**
- Soft blush pink (#FCF6F5)
- Deep brown (#8A5A44)
- Metallic gold (#D4AF37)
- Cream beige (#F8E2D8)
- Warm bronze (#C1966B)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Black (#000000)
product_color: The product image of the Guerlain Aqua Allegoria perfume showcases a luxurious and feminine color palette that would beautifully translate into an elegant advertisement banner. Dominant hues include a soft blush pink (#FAD4D0), reflecting the liquid inside, and a radiant metallic gold (#D4AF37) used on the cap, label border, and honeycomb pattern, which symbolizes opulence. A subtle white (#FFFFFF) background and label enhance the clarity and sophistication. The text in golden yellow (#E2B842) and rose pink (#D95485) adds refined highlights. The colors blend harmoniously, with the golden tones accentuating the bottle’s luxurious details, while the pink base adds freshness and charm.
